can anyone help me quick: i want to up xp on one of my hdd and ubuntu is on the my first hdd
if i just got install on other hdd will the install of xp wipe grub boot record?
Are you using multiple HDDs or just multiple partitions on ine disk?
Should be no problem, Windows usually installs its bootloader on the MBR of the disk you put it on.
Even if it does f*ck up your Boot Manager (Grub) you can reinstall that from a LiveCD easily. So make sure you have a LiveCD handy for the worst case.
